About Me

Hi, I'm Amin Khan, a passionate and self-driven Full Stack Web Developer currently pursuing my Bachelor's in Computer Science. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL, I love building responsive, user-friendly web applications that solve real-world problems.

I specialize in creating dynamic front-end interfaces and robust back-end systems. I'm always eager to explore new technologies, contribute to exciting projects, and grow as a developer.

Whether it's designing beautiful UIs or writing clean and efficient code, I enjoy the full journey of web development — from idea to execution.
